properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 6 at 10:29PM EST until February 8 at 2:00AM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...

West Chickamauga Creek near Fort Oglethorpe affecting Catoosa and
Hamilton Counties

Lookout Creek near New England affecting Dade and Hamilton
Counties

South Chickamauga Creek near Ringgold affecting Catoosa County

The Flood Warning continues for
The Lookout Creek near New England.
* Until late Friday night.
* At 10 PM Thursday the stage was 20.4 feet, and nearly steady.
* Major flooding is occurring, and major flooding is forecast to
continue.
* Flood stage is 12 feet.
* The river will begin to fall, dropping below flood stage by
Friday evening.
* At 20 feet, major flooding continues. Several homes begin to flood
near Sells Lane and Lookout Creek Road and many buildings near Creek
Road and the New England hang gliding park. In addition, flooding of
the bridge and road along Nickajack Road near Lookout Creek occurs.
Some residence will likely need to evacuate. Also major flooding
will occur downstream as the creek crosses the Tennessee border into
the Tiftona area. Several roads near the creek will be flooded and
closed with a few feet of water.

NWSheadline: Flood Warning extended until late Friday night
